articles.title: CHRISTOPHER STEVENS review: How unremitting anger soured a heroic campaign for the disabled - Daily Mail
articles.description: CHRISTOPHER STEVENS: Anger is the most selfish emotion. It takes friendships and love, and burns them up for fuel. However much anger achieves, it leaves more ugliness than inspiration.
